query: How many casual leaves do I have left this month?
hr_response: As per policy, you are allowed 2 casual leaves per month. Our records show you already took 1 casual leave in August, so you have 1 remaining.

query: When will my salary be credited this month?
hr_response: Salary is credited on the last working day of every month. Since 31st August is a Sunday, your salary will be credited on 30th August (Saturday).

query: Can I work from home tomorrow?
hr_response: WFH is allowed up to 6 days per month with prior manager approval. You currently have 2 WFH days left this month, please confirm with your manager.

query: How do I update my residential address in the records?
hr_response: Please submit an address change request form via the HR portal. Once approved, it will be updated in our database within 3 working days.

query: Does the company provide health insurance for parents?
hr_response: Our group health insurance covers employee, spouse, and up to 2 children. Parents are not included by default, but you can opt for top-up insurance at your own cost.
